employees.notes: Proff reports 42 employees for SWEROCK AS.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports 2024 operating revenue of 317,991 with amounts stated in thousands; converted to NOK 317,991,000.[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: The Norwegian legal entity is identified as SWEROCK AS with org. no. 983065309 in Proff, and the company site states YIT Norge AS changed name to Swerock AS with the same org number.[1][2]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Reviewed Norwegian company sources show core activity in aggregate extraction/supply and an environmental goal to increase reuse, but no concrete, quantified inbound SRM input stream was documented for SWEROCK AS.[2][3][4]
gaps_and_uncertainties: No reviewed source provided a Norwegian-entity annual/sustainability dataset with explicit SRM input quantities for SWEROCK AS.[1][2]
The environmental page mentions increasing use of reused materials, but does not specify actual material types, sites, or volumes currently used as inbound inputs.[3]
A permit page refers to operation of a clean-mass landfill/deposit site, which is not clear evidence of SRM as production input.[4]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn SWEROCK AS Org nr 983 065 309
evidence.claim: Legal entity name and organization number.

evidence.evidence_snippet: NACE-bransje 08.120 Utvinning fra grus- og sandtak, og utvinning av leire og kaolin

evidence.claim: Revenue table amounts are in thousands NOK.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Swerock er merkevaren for pukk & grus.
evidence.claim: Company brand focus in Norway is aggregates (pukk and grus).

evidence.evidence_snippet: YIT Norge AS (Org. nr 983 065 309) skiftet i den forbindelse navn til Swerock AS.
evidence.claim: Confirms name change linkage to the same org number.

evidence.evidence_snippet: all grus og pukkvirksomhet er samlet i et og samme selskap (Swerock AS).
evidence.claim: Indicates Norwegian gravel and crushed stone operations are within Swerock AS.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Øke bruken av gjenbruksmaterialer i vår grus- og bergproduksjon
evidence.claim: States a reuse-material objective in aggregate/rock production.

evidence.evidence_snippet: drift av deponi for rene masser ... Tillatelsene overdras fra Frøseth AS til Swerock AS.
evidence.claim: Permit context is clean-mass landfill operation transferred to Swerock AS.

sources.title: SWEROCK AS - Org.nr. 983 065 309 - Verdal - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
Vedtak - endring av tillatelser - overdragelse av virksomhet fra Frøseth AS til Swerock AS i Levanger og Inderøy
